name: Radical Squad
description:
Radical Squad: Explosive Locomotive is an against the clock bomb defusing puzzle game, testing your whits, skills and speed!

Save the day by disarming a series of explosives hidden on a high speed train by your arch nemesis, but make sure you are quick about it.

Using whits, cunning and a whole lot of luck, defuse all the bombs on the train before the timer hits 0 and its game over!

Good luck.
